README.md.content:
# my_midway_project

## QuickStart

<!-- add docs here for user -->

see [midway docs][midway] for more detail.

### Development

```bash
$ npm i
$ npm run dev
$ open http://localhost:7001/
```

### Deploy

```bash
$ npm start
```

### npm scripts

- Use `npm run lint` to check code style.
- Use `npm test` to run unit test.


[midway]: https://midwayjs.org

README.zh-CN.md.content:
# my_midway_project

## 快速入门

<!-- 在此次添加使用文档 -->

如需进一步了解，参见 [midway 文档][midway]。

### 本地开发

```bash
$ npm i
$ npm run dev
$ open http://localhost:7001/
```

### 部署

```bash
$ npm start
```

### 内置指令

- 使用 `npm run lint` 来做代码风格检查。
- 使用 `npm test` 来执行单元测试。


[midway]: https://midwayjs.org

package.json.content:
{
  "name": "my-midway-project",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "description": "",
  "private": true,
  "dependencies": {
    "@midwayjs/bootstrap": "^2.3.0",
    "@midwayjs/core": "^2.3.0",
    "@midwayjs/decorator": "^2.3.0",
    "@midwayjs/koa": "^2.3.0",
    "@midwayjs/orm": "^2.13.2",
    "koa-bodyparser": "^4.3.0",
    "sqlite3": "^5.0.2",
    "typeorm": "^0.2.37"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@midwayjs/cli": "^1.0.0",
    "@midwayjs/luckyeye": "^1.0.0",
    "@midwayjs/mock": "^2.3.0",
    "@types/jest": "^26.0.10",
    "@types/koa-bodyparser": "^4.3.0",
    "@types/node": "14",
    "cross-env": "^6.0.0",
    "jest": "^26.4.0",
    "mwts": "^1.0.5",
    "ts-jest": "^26.2.0",
    "typescript": "^4.0.0"
  },
  "engines": {
    "node": ">=12.0.0"
  },
  "scripts": {
    "start": "NODE_ENV=production node ./bootstrap.js",
    "dev": "cross-env NODE_ENV=local midway-bin dev --ts",
    "test": "midway-bin test --ts",
    "cov": "midway-bin cov --ts",
    "lint": "mwts check",
    "lint:fix": "mwts fix",
    "ci": "npm run cov",
    "build": "midway-bin build -c",
    "check": "luckyeye"
  },
  "midway-bin-clean": [
    ".vscode/.tsbuildinfo",
    "dist"
  ],
  "midway-luckyeye": {
    "packages": [
      "midway_v2"
    ]
  },
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": ""
  },
  "author": "anonymous",
  "license": "MIT"
}

tsconfig.json.content:
{
  "compileOnSave": true,
  "compilerOptions": {
    "target": "ES2018",
    "module": "commonjs",
    "moduleResolution": "node",
    "experimentalDecorators": true,
    "emitDecoratorMetadata": true,
    "inlineSourceMap":true,
    "noImplicitThis": true,
    "noUnusedLocals": true,
    "stripInternal": true,
    "skipLibCheck": false,
    "pretty": true,
    "declaration": true,
    "typeRoots": [ "./typings", "./node_modules/@types"],
    "outDir": "dist"
  },
  "exclude": [
    "dist",
    "node_modules",
    "test"
  ]
}
